field.value: Custom attributes of virtual properties absent on proxy

field.name: description
field.value:
Custom attributes defined on virtual properties are not getting added to the proxy. See also: http://forum.castleproject.org/viewtopic.php?t=4906
I've included a patch which resolves the problem. Please apply the patch to Tools\Castle.DynamicProxy2.
